Does plucking one grey hair make more grow? Doctor answers
description: We’ve all been there – staring in the mirror, carefully reaching for the silver strand glistening under the bathroom light, trying to pluck it. Dermatologist debunks the myth that plucking one grey hair leads to ten more. She explains that each hair follicle is independent and cannot trigger surrounding ones to produce more grey hairs. However, plucking can damage the follicle, potentially preventing hair from growing back at all.

title: An umpire's error? Why India A's relay catch against Pakistan Shaheens ruled out

This decision aided Pakistan A's eight-wicket victory, securing their semi-final spot.

Notably, players from both sides exchanged handshakes and shared a bus, fostering goodwill despite broader bilateral tensions.

Despite GitHub Copilot's market share decline, Nadella highlights the overall market expansion and GitHub's platform strategy, which benefits from increased developer activity regardless of the specific coding tool used.

title: Toronto in talks to land Cubs’ $460 million standout as blockbuster trade looms
description: The Toronto Blue Jays are reportedly frontrunners to acquire elite two-way outfielder Kyle Tucker from the Houston Astros. This blockbuster move could significantly boost Toronto's championship aspirations by adding a consistent, game-changing bat to their lineup. The trade would address Houston's payroll constraints while providing them with valuable young talent for the future.

title: Kayla Nicole accused of using AI for apology as fans analyse her statement
description: Kayla Nicole faces renewed online backlash over decade-old offensive tweets. Her subsequent apology has ignited a debate, with accusations of using AI to craft her statement. Critics question the sincerity of her remorse, while others argue the focus should be on her growth and acknowledging past harm, not AI detection.

title: ‘The Fate of Ophelia’ sparks theories: Taylor Swift revisits her Joe Alwyn breakup
description: Taylor Swift's new song, 'The Fate of Ophelia,' is fueling fan theories linking it to her breakup with Joe Alwyn.  Swifties interpret lyrics about rescue and rebirth as a nod to her current relationship, contrasting it with her past. The track is seen as Swift reclaiming her narrative, transforming heartbreak into art.

title: 'Proudly called it home for 15 years': Google CEO on Texas journey
description: Google is investing a massive $40 billion in Texas by 2027. This significant commitment will build new cloud and AI infrastructure, including data centers in Armstrong and Haskell Counties. The company will also boost energy resilience and support thousands of new jobs. Google is also funding projects to train more electricians for the AI era.

title: Chat on WhatsApp instantly: Steps to text unsaved numbers; no new contact required
description: WhatsApp allows users to initiate chats without saving contacts by using Click to Chat links or the official "Chat on WhatsApp" button. This feature streamlines communication for temporary interactions and business inquiries, offering flexibility on both mobile and web platforms. Users can create custom links with pre-filled messages for added convenience.
